attributes.action: Allow HEMP to Maintain its credability.
attributes.additional_details: HEMP as the capability to save the Planet Earth, Why are we not producing HEMP on a massive scale, The benefits of HEMP weights out the Negative?, There is no negative about HEMP only POSITIVE, HEMP can be used for over 25,000 different products, Including, Fuel, Oil, Food, Constructive, for example, HEMP bricks, HEMP is ECO friendly to the environment, It will also clean the oxygen you breath after the million cars releasing Co2 for many years, WE NEED TO CLEAN UP and Produce HEMP.
